Reference

Sass compilation

Tools for invoking and controling Sass -> CSS compilation

sass()

Compile Sass to CSS

sass_options() sass_options_get() sass_options_set()

Compiler Options for Sass

output_template()

An intelligent (temporary) output file

Sass code

Tools for generating Sass code from R

as_sass()

Convert an R object into Sass code

sass_import() sass_file()

Sass Import

sass_layer() sass_layer_file() sass_bundle() sass_bundle_remove() is_sass_bundle()

Bundling Sass layers

sass_partial()

Compile rules against a Sass Bundle or Sass Layer object

Caching

Functions related to caching sass output

sass_file_cache()

Create a file cache object

sass_cache_get()

Retrieve the default file cache

Font importing

Helpers for importing font files

font_google() font_link() font_face() font_collection() is_font_collection()

Helpers for importing web fonts
